aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.intro: Hi, I'm Daniel — a fullstack developer who loves translating ideas into fast, accessible interfaces. I get the biggest thrill when a tricky UI interaction finally clicks and users feel right at home.

highlights.location: Based in Seligenstadt, Germany — I collaborate happily across time zones and I'm open to remote-first teams.
highlights.mindset: Curious and open-minded — I explore new web tech every sprint and share findings with the crew.
highlights.problem: Problem solver at heart — I break challenges into experiments, measure impact, and iterate toward polish.

skills.title: Skill Set
skills.description: A short introduction of your skills. Highlight your experience of using different front-end technologies and emphasise your openness to learning and adapting to new technologies. Show how important it is for you to keep up with the rapid changes in web development.

cta.title: You need
cta.text: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.lead: Explore a selection of my work here – interact with projects to see my skills in action.

pokedex.title: Pokedex
pokedex.subtitle: API-driven Pokédex
pokedex.description: Responsive Pokédex powered by the PokéAPI. Search, filter, and explore Pokémon stats with smooth animations and offline caching.

goblinSlayer.title: Goblin Slayer
goblinSlayer.subtitle: Jump n Run Web Game
goblinSlayer.description: A browser-based tactical battle prototype with responsive UI, modular enemy AI, and reusable component-based architecture.

problem.title: Got a problem to solve?
problem.description: Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in. Show that you will add value to their projects through your work. Need a Fullstack developer? Let's talk!
